name: Bubble Rescue
description:
Enjoy playing classic bubble shooters?

Start playing Bubble Rescue today!

Play, pop and crush in this bubble shooter puzzle!

Blast through each level in a challenging mission. In this bubble shooter, you have to aim, match and combine, target your shots carefully in this bubble blast challenge with different difficulty levels throughout the game.

Levels range from easy to hard for everyone to enjoy, accessible on-the-go, offline and online.

Bubble Rescue is completely free to play but some optional in-game items will require payment. You can turn off the payment feature by disabling in-app purchases in your device’s settings.

Follow us to get news and updates on Twitter @BubbleRescue

Have fun playing Bubble Rescue the most bubbly match 3 puzzle game around!
